title: Trump’s Digital Dream, The Squid Game Myth 10.22.21
itunes:title: Trump’s Digital Dream, The Squid Game Myth 10.22.21
description:
In episode 1014, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and writer Danielle Radford to discuss Trump’s New Social Media App is Already a Digital Dumpster Fire, Good News: Money For Green Energy Creates More Jobs Than Fossil Fuel Investment, New Study Finds, What about that Build Back Better Bill? Where we at? Squid Game isn’t ruining ISPs, ISPs are just greedy fucking pricks, Rotten Tomatoes = culture war,  and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump’s New Social Media App is Already a Digital Dumpster Fire
  2. Money For Green Energy Creates More Jobs Than Fossil Fuel Investment, New Study Finds 
  3. What about that Build Back Better Bill? Where we at? 
  4. Squid Game isn’t ruining ISPs, ISPs are just greedy fucking pricks
  5. Rotten Tomatoes Reviews Are the Culture War’s New Battlefield
  6. LISTEN: L U C Y - Almost Blue


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
